transcript:
The person you have called is speaking to someone else. You can wait or call again later.
Hello
Hello
Han bataiye sir.
Ji Pravesh ji kya baat hua bank walon se?
Bank walon se jo baat hua wo shayad maine aapko chahte to kuch nahi bheja aaj main usko bulaya tha unhone stamp leke pata nahi last take final sign pata nahi kis tarah karaya kya karaya form pe.
Hmm okay acha mere ko ek cheez bataiye aapki side se mera catalog mein kuch bahut acha response nahi mila hai.
Jo abhi main dekh raha hu pichle kuch dinon se ab aisa to hai nahi ki matlab maine aapko che mahine agar ek installment aapki reh rahi hai mere commitment mein wo bhi mera legal problem hai aapke samne hai sari cheeze bank walon ko number sabko de diya.
Thik hai dusra problem ye hai na ki aapke paas ek to mera pet ka enquiry aa raha hai aap Shweta mam ka phone nahi utha rahe abhi unhone mujhe bataya dusra.
Ha unhone kab call kiya ek sir ek thik hai abhi call sense mein leta hu ek second rukiye kare unhone aapko.
Kab call kiya mujhe aap batao.
The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Call nahi hai.
Wo screenshot bhejo unko.
Han bhejo.
Thik one minute.
Call pe nahi hai agar baat kare.
Ek minute ek minute main abhi just bhej rahi hu aapko.
Bhej de jaldi bhej yaar.
Check kijiye aapke paas teen call gayi hai maine abhi thik hai aapke whatsapp pe bhej diya Pravesh sir main aapke bhi bhej de rahi hu thik hai.
Bhejo.
Check kar lo dono log.
Kar leta hu acha dusra ye batao unko problem batao kya problem aa rahi hai tumko.
Han check karo aaya hai Ranjit ji.
Today aaj abhi ek 20 mein mera phone busy aa raha hoga I think.
Nahi aapka pura call gaya tha ek 18 pe bhi gaya hai fir ek 18 pe gaya hai maine just cut kiya aur fir maine ek 19 pe bhi gaya hai.
Matlab sir aaj aaj hi call kiya na aapne.
Just today likha ho to us pe.
Han ek minute mam rukiye line pe ek minute mam ha koi ek cheez ha aap sir ek minute main abhi check kar raha hu agar main galat hu to main accept bhi karunga ek minute mujhe bhi apna call block check karne dijiye.
Han check kariye.
Hello.
Han boliye.
Han Shweta mam hai.
Han boliye boliye.
Shweta mam ring gaya tha aapke paas batao matlab ring gaya tha kyuki mere mein dikh hi nahi raha agar nahi sach mein gaya tha mere paas bhaiya baithe hai main unse baat kara du aapki sach mein gaya tha aapka pura ring gaya hai ya koi technical issue hua ho meri side se koi galti nahi hui main aapko bata rahi hu koi technical issue hua ho to aapke paas call nahi gayi hogi baki mere side se puri ring gayi hai.
Thik hai mam thik hai kyuki mam sach mein mere paas ek bhi call nahi aayi hai aur is time main sach mein busy tha call pe aur mere paas koi aisa wo bhi call nahi aaya ki kisi ka incoming aa raha hai mere paas isiliye maine bola ki sir unka call kab aaya kyuki raat mein jab Bablu sir call karte hain 8:30 baje 9 baje main unka call utha ke unko bhi call back karta hu thik hai aisa nahi hua hai ki main aapka call nahi uthaunga mujhe to uthana hai aapka call maine aapko ha wahi maine aapko proof bhi de diya ki mam abhi mere ko ye bataiye aapne India mart ne mera sara catalog hata rakha hai wo main jo check kar pa raha hu.
Han aapne sare product mere hata rakhe hain.
Sir pure 104 product added hai sir kaun bol raha hai hata rakha hai added nahi hai wo kya koi bhi customer ko waha pe show nahi ho rahe hain.
Aap check kar lijiyega aapne catalog wo bhi aaj se nahi hataya isko gaye shukrawar ko hataya hai mera.
Nahi sir main aapko bata deta hu main samajh gaya jo client visible kar rahe honge ki koi product search kar raha hoga aapka glass jar to Radha Krishna overseas nahi dikh raha hoga correct.
Hmm hmm hai na wo isliye hua hai jab aapka Saturday ko time block laga hai to jab time block lagta hai achi baat ye hai ki aapka buylead aapko pura hafte ka mil gaya hai uske baad aapka time block laga hai thik hai agar time block pehle lag jata to aapko weekly buylead bhi nahi milta jo hamara pehle is bar concern hua tha aapko yaad hoga thik hai but is bar jo time block laga hai kehna hai ki aapko do installment de chuka hu thik hai ek installment unfortunately mere sath koi problem hua wo legal problem hai thik hai ab aap ye bolo ki uske liye main kisi se ek lakh se dedh lakh karja leke fir main aapko du not not possible.
Mere liye ek dedh lakh lena kisi ko bhi phone kar dunga ghuma dunga to mere liye aa jayega lekin wo main ek lakh kisi se karja leke aapko nahi de sakta mera paisa already 10 12 lakh usme block hai to main kyu kisi se paisa leke aur aapko du.
Thik dusri baat aapki taraf se mere ko kal jo sunne ko mila aap recording line pe sun lijiyega aap mera kal hatao aaj hata do mujhe fark nahi padta un cheezon se reason ki main aapki is company se char saal se juda hua hu char saal mein kya maine aapki ek single bar aapki beimani kar li kisi tarah koi bhi mere sath paristhiti pareshani aayi wo legal sari pareshani aapke samne malum hai recent mein mother expire hui thi wo bhi aapko pata hai usse pehle jo hua tha wo bhi malum hai isse pehle jo abhi ho raha hai wo bhi pata hai aapko sari cheeze knowledge mein hai aisa nahi nahi malum ho thik uske bawajud agar mere sath mera to fir aap mera paisa refund karwa dijiyega aap mera band kar dijiyega India mart kal karo wo abhi kar do mere ko fark nahi padna usse mera sale down hogi vyapar khatam hoga ho jaye fark nahi padna un cheezon se thik hai aap kar do mera jo paisa bachta hai kitna amount bachega ek bar mujhe bata dijiye calculation karke aap wapas karwa dijiye mere paise.
Calculation to account se milti hai na sir to wo to agar main aap ek bar karwa ke mujhe mail karwa dijiyega main approval de deta hu side se mera cancel kar dijiyega.
Thik hai sir ab aap batao isme dikkat kya aa rahi hai kyu aap aisa dikkat sab kuch aa rahi hai aapne commitment kiya tha panch aapne mere ko 5 lakh 5000 ka plan becha aaj sai wala jo vyapar kar raha hai aaj GM wale vyapar kar rahe hain thik hai un sab ka vyapar chal raha hai mera kyu nahi chal raha hai aap log kabhi time block laga dete kabhi kya main aapko leke bhag gaya kya paise aapke time block nahi sir time block aapko maine bataya ki ek hafte tak uske baad bhi uske bawajud bhi aapne pehle bhi mera vyapar kaun sa acha nikal ke de diya wo bata do.
Sir vyapar to acha hi nikla hoga sir aisa bilkul nahi nikla sir nahi nikla sir bilkul nahi nikla sir 100% sure hu main nahi nahi ha lekin paisa invest isliye kiya tha ki chalo thik hai chote plan hai bahut sare log is line mein aa gaye hain aur is wale vyaparon ko kar rahe hain lekin main acha khasa plan le leta hu Shweta mam ke kehne pe diya unse bhi meri beech beech mein ho jati hai faltu bechari ko sunna padta hai to mera saaf aapse kehna aap mera hata dijiye mera paisa jo bachta hai mera to dekhiye main soch lunga meri maa kaisi patient thi 18 lakh kharch kiye 2 lakh aur kar dijiye thik hai apne man ko samjhane ke liye apni santushti ke liye apni santushti ke liye insan kuch bhi kar sakta hai aur hota hai main soch lunga aur do mahine ji gayi thi to continue main matlab unko Shweta bhi hold par rahega mera kehne ka matlab ye hai ki do mahine aur ji gayi unke treatment mein chemo ye wo sab emergency matlab mere ko admit karna pada ventilator pe is tarike se apne cheezon ko main manage kar lunga koi problem nahi hai uske baad jo finally ek mujhe aap sham ko bata dijiyega ki mera aapka Pravesh ji itna payment bachta hai itna mere ko continue aapse wo nahi rakhna hai ab India mart ka plan mujhe band karna hai mere ko nahi rakhna fir main itni sab cheeze itna time du usko uske bawajud complaint ho jaye uske baad bahut sari cheeze manage karna hota hai aap mera kar dijiye band main chahta hu band karwana thik main khud keh raha hu aapko thik hai mera paisa bachta hai uska confirmation okay no problem sir aapke paas mail aa jayega thik hai mail bhi aa jayega aur call confirmation ke liye call bhi aa jayega aap baat kar lijiyega thik hai aur time block to aapko pata hi hai sir ki ek hafte tak grace period milega pura time block se mera band kar dijiyega aap aap band kar dijiyega time block ko aap bar bar ki dhamkiya mere ko sir ek minute aapne baat apni clear ki maine mujhe bhi meri baat clear karne dijiye sir thik hai time block wali baat aapko pehle se aapko pata hai sir ki ek hafte ka grace period mila balance payment nahi aaya to service time block hui hai band nahi hui hai buylead aapki team aaj bhi utha rahi hai aaj bhi aapke paas aapke paas har ek weekly ka 68 buylead daily ka jitna jata hai aapko paas hai balance aur aapki team buylead bhi purchase kar rahi hai aapke sare product 104 product added hai uska to paisa aap aap de dijiyega na aapke sare product ka paisa bhi jo product added hai wo product bhi aapka added hai thik hai dusri cheez sir jo aap bol rahe ho ki time block kyu laga kyuki sir aapka ek hafta pending ho gaya balance amount ki wo payment nahi aaya is wajah se wo aapka time block laga hai sir aap jis din payment aap karte hain balance payment usi din aapka time block bhi remove hota hai aur aapki listing dobara se dikhne lagti hai sir thik hai aur main band karwane ke liye main kyu karu agar jis din aapka complaint aaya tha sir kyu maine aapka affidavit ye sara cheez complaint store karaya agar aapko band hi karwana hota to aap mujhe affidavit kyu nahi dete sir complaint wala usi din band karwa diye hote sir hmm nahi aap karwana hai na aapko samajh aa gaya mere ko samajh aa gaya main mera mera dub gaya 5 lakh dub gaya Ranjit ji aapke kehne pe mera 5 lakh dub gaya teen mahine ho gaye teen mahine mere ko agar ek lakh ki bhi deal hoti na wo bhi main dekh sakta tha ha main bol raha hu sir aur continue follow up le raha hu Shweta mam se bol diya aap rehne dijiye main baat karunga main bhi baat kar raha hu na party ko response nahi aa raha Shweta list utha ke bhejo abhi inko aur batao inko kya kar rahe hain kya client ke wo aa rahe hain scene mere ko bewakuf samajh ke rakha hua hai yaha pe pagal hu kya 5 lakh invest karne ke baad mere ko client se wo nahi mil raha response nahi mil raha bhejo abhi aur batao unko turant kya kya response hai party ke ha main bhej rahi hu karo baat unse kitne number se usne nikale the tumne register mein bata na kitne se deal hui hai kya dikkat aa rahi hai inse baat karo kyu aa rahi hai dikkate aap plan bechne ke baad koi musibat nahi banti aapki acha sir plan lene ke baad meri kya maine aapko servicing bilkul bhi nahi Shweta mam ne teen call kare wo samne wali ladki aapko screenshot bhej chuki hai main kaise man lu ki call nahi gaya hoga 30 second ka timing hota hai sir 30 second se timing hota hai sare call 30 second call chali hai ya mazak kiya inhone main Shweta se abhi bol dunga kyu kiya mazak agar kiya bhi hai to to main wahi cheez bol raha main abhi apne screenshot mere paas call aaya nahi hai sir iska matlab Shweta jhoot bol rahi hai main abhi aapko apna screenshot bhej raha hu sir ek minute ha Ranjit ji maine na aapko number contact dal diya hai jin partiyon se maine teen din mein baat kari hai ye sari wo party hai jisme enquiry valid sab hai aur in puri partiyon mein se genuinely bata rahi hu sirf ek party ne response kiya wo bhi char box ka char box aur baki partiyon ne kya bola baki partiyon se main aapko screenshot dal sakti hu ya aapko aur bhi proof chahiye to main aapko wo bhi bhej sakti hu baki partiyon se mera bhale hi baat chal rahi hai aur kuch nahi hai to call hi attend nahi kara maine teen teen se char char bar call kari hai aur kuch busy hai kisi ko wo chahiye nahi hamare paas wo client aa rahe hain jo kahi duniya mein matlab ek chote plan walon pe wo bhi unka kam acha chal raha hai jinka chota plan hai thik hai hum logo wo client aa rahe hain ek dabba chahiye do dabba chahiye sir sample dekh de sir abhi nahi teen mahine baad planning karenge to ye matlab kya hai mere paas paisa faltu hai kya main already itna pareshan hu apni pareshani se aap log samajh hi nahi rahe ho to sir bulk order bhi to mam log utha rahi hai sir aisa kaise possible hai wo hai ki ab main abhi kuch thoda sa bol dunga usse fir aapko thoda sa maybe to bura lag jayega to thik hai main kehna nahi chahta fir main bulk order bhi maine uthaye hain main genuinely bata rahi hu usme buylead enquiry sari cheeze hain but ek party ne main single party ka aapko number bhi de sakti hu usi party se deal hui hai 2676 rupees ki deal hui hai sirf wo bhi teen se char din mein aur baki ko koi response koi response nahi aa raha order hi nahi hai unko chahiye hi nahi and second agar main aapko matlab ye maine teen din ka bola maine aapse last jab baat kari thi maine bola ki jo ho gaya so ho gaya baki ab main 5 lakh dal diya koi matlab nahi nikla 5 lakh kahi lagata dusre business mein to mere ko kam se kam 500 daily ke bachte wo bhi mere liye ache the isliye main keh raha hu aap mera paisa wapas karwa do please agar meri kuch majburi paristhiti samajh rahe ho to aapko lag raha hai ha sach mein main pareshan hu to mera paisa refund karwa do bas aapka banne ka jo banta hai uske baad mera paisa refund karwa do main nahi kar paunga aage payment koi fayda nahi hai na karne ka thik hai sir no problem thik hai thik hai aap mujhe ek wo dalwa dijiyega performa ke hisab se aapka itna balance bachta hai ye aapko refund ho jayega thik hai aap mera karwa dijiyega please main aapse request kar raha hu hath jod ke aur aapki company aage mera plan hatana chahe hata de hamesha ke liye mujhe koi problem nahi main khud se chahta hu main hatana chahta hu thik hai mere ko nahi karna India mart ke sath vyapar aise teen mahine mein mere ko ek lakh ka income generate nahi hua to main kya karunga karke theek hai aap hatwa do please ha hatwaiye please thik hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Catalog not performing well.

- Shweta Mam not answering calls.

- Wants to remove catalog from IndiaMART.

- Wants refund of remaining amount.

- No proper servicing after plan purchase.



Resolution:

- Executive checked call logs, calls were made.

- Executive will send mail for refund.

- Executive clarified time block is not permanent.



Next Steps: 

- Mail and call for refund confirmation.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, refund, time block, buyleads, servicing
